data.message: I am not liking the new chat pls put the little pic in the corneragain i use this to open peoples fb since it is easier than typing their names or looking thru a hundred posts to click a link, now i need to say something and wait for them to respond to click on the pic - which they probly wont do straight away... and yes this may seem trivial to u but as a typing impaired - MY FINGERS DONT WORK - anything that is a shortcut is valued - also take off the goddam friends suggestion: the friend of my friend is NOT NECESSARILY my friend - ALSO some people actually have famous people on their friends list that THEY ACTUALLY KNOW and they have these people in their lists and their lists hidden for a reason duhhhhr
